text: The cricket teams of Bangladesh and England have played against each other in One Day Internationalss since 2000. They have met on 15 occasions. England is most successful with 13 victories, Bangladesh have won in only 2 games. ==Summary of results== Total Won by Bangladesh Won by England Tie/NR In Bangladesh 7 1 6 0 In England 6 1 5 0 In Neutral Venue 2 0 2 0 Total 15 2 13 0 == List of matches == === In Bangladesh === === In England === === In Neutral Venue === == Related pages == *Bangladesh national cricket team *England national cricket team == References == == Other websites == *ESPNcricinfo Category:England sport-related lists Category:Bangladeshi cricket lists Category:Cricket in England and Wales Category:Lists of international cricket matches
title: List of One Day International cricket matches played by Bangladesh and England
